title: &dyn* causes an ICE

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(dyn_star)] #![allow(incomplete_features)] use core::fmt::Debug; fn main() { let i = 42 as &dyn* Debug; } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.66.0-nightly (e7119a030 2022-09-22) ``` ### Error output ``` [](error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_trait_selection/src/traits/select/confirmation.rs:1147:18: impossible case reached) ```
Backtrace
